claim: Amazon reduced GHG emissions by 7% in 2020.

result.label: not_greenwashing
result.justification: According to the passages from Amazon's ESG report, they reduced GHG emissions by 7% in 2020.

passages.content: In 2020, Amazon achieved a 7% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions intensity compared to 2019, while delivering 65% more packages globally.
Our absolute carbon emissions decreased from 51.17 million metric tons CO2e in 2019 to 47.59 million metric tons CO2e in 2020.
This reduction was driven by investments in renewable energy, with Amazon reaching 65% renewable electricity across operations.

This reduction was driven by investments in renewable energy, with Amazon reaching 65% renewable electricity across operations.
